title: Drawing, "Design for a Soup Tureen (elevation)", 1945
medium: Pen and black, green ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, upper right: 448
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower center: SOUPIERE/MILIEU DE TABLE; lower right: JEAN PUIFORCAT/45.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Bulbous body tapering at the bottom, the lower half decorated with seven applied bands. The rounded shoulder decorated with two applied bands, flanked by thin rectangular handles surmounted by ball decorations indicated in green ink. The circular lid comprised of a plinth, disc, and ball finial indicated in green ink. Underdrawing in graphite of tureen in golden section.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Soup Tureen (elevation)", 1945.
1945. Pen and black, green ink, graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-31.
